text:
The text you provided has been parsed and extracted into a JSON format. The extracted data includes the following information:

**Movie information:**
- Title
- Release year
- Type
- Plot summary
- Douban score
- Douban link
- IMDb score
- Picture link
- Country of origin
- Number of episodes

**Other information:**
- Cast and crew
- Technical information
- Production information
- Download links

Please note that this data only includes information extracted from the text and does not include any additional information.
